title: SIEGE AT MINAS TIRITH - Third Age Total War Gameplay
description:
Third Age Total War Gameplay - Minas Tirith is under siege!  Mordor marches their armies to take the final stronghold.  It is up to the brave men of Gondor to save middle earth from darkness!  Enjoy the Battle :D

If you enjoyed the video don't forget to Like and Leave a comment :D
